author: Anonymous Comp
title: Accumulator with find/search - try-catch?
question: Do we still include the try-catch @template tag when we have search/find functions with accumulators? I noticed that the find-path-tr solution didn't have try-catch. Do we not use try-catch when it is tail-recursive?
student_answer: If we drop (if (not (false? …))) then we drop the try-catch template.
